text:
Hello!

Is there a way to backup HubSpot files and templates? I used Skyvia to backup HubSpot CRM data, but I can't find any tool to backup files and templates...
Could always use the CLI to bring down your Design Manager assets and then use Git for version control.
:point_up:
Thank you for the suggestion <@U26BLKGE4>
anyone else running into issues with workflows and company/deal records not loading?
my coworkers can't see meeting links, tickets, or companies either
<https://status.HubSpot.com/>
yup, major outage
Anyone else having issues with adding new modules to a page?
<@U8THBCFC4> We change multiple modules on a page. Most of those are CTA’s, rich text content and forms.
Occasionally we will change a complete page.
Is this question related to <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Smart-content-and-Blog-content-for-custom-modules/idc-p/383055#M67551|this>?
This only happens when I use the ‘Add new module’ button in the ‘Contents’ tab.
Dragging the module on the page does not cause the error.
Seems it is fixed now

Hi! I cloned a theme and I'm trying to use a global module from the cloned theme in a drag and drop template I'm creating in another branch in the design tools view. The problem is, this module is not available in the "Add..." drop-down menu in the drag and drop template design view. I've checked the "Make available in templates and pages" option in the design view of the module I'm trying to reuse.

Any reason why I'm not able to reuse certain modules, even if checked as "make available"?
me too
has this been fixed in your end?

Is there a setting for the date format used by the date pickers in the HS forms? I have a form that is using to different formats depending on the device size viewing the form.
• For Desktops the format displays: YYYY-DD-MM
• For Mobile devices the format is: MM-DD-YYYY (Preferred Format)
Not sure why its changing responsively. Cool feature but unnecessary.
